name: Light Up
description:
Light Up.

Meditative simulator of lighthouse watcher life. This game was made for #UE4JAM, theme was "down to earth". We're living simple life of down to earth person

Team Name:

Light up team

Controls:

Keyboard:
Move - WASD
Use - Space Bar
Take - E
Journal - Q

TEAM

Nikita Smirnov
Aleksey Reznikov

No content was created before jam.
